name: Jud Larson
introduction: Jud Larson (born 21 January 1923 and died 11 June 1966) was an American racecar driver who participated in the USAC Championship Car series between 1951 and 1966. During his time in the series, he participated in five Indianapolis 500 races while it was a part of the Formula One championship. His best finish was 8th place at the 1958 Indianapolis 500.
